decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed works would cause harm to the historic plan form of the listed building, involve an unacceptable loss of historic fabric, and would erode the visual and spatial distinction between the historic plan form of the rear basement room and the new extension which it adjoins. The proposals would therefore adversely affect the special architectural and historic interest of the listed building, and cause harm to the significance of the heritage asset contrary to the objectives of Chapter 16 (Conserving and enhancing the historic environment) of the National Planning Policy Framework 2019, Policy HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan 2021, Policy CS9 (Protecting and enhancing Islington's built and historic environment) of Islington's Core Strategy 2011 and Policy DM2.3 (Heritage) of Islington's Development Management Policies 2013.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
•	981017 – Listed Building Consent was granted on July 22nd, 1998 in connection with the refurbishment of the property. No drawings are readily available, but it is likely that the works consented included the removal of the spine wall at lower-ground floor, and the adaption of the rear window at lower ground floor level into a doorway.
•	P090517 and P090519 – Planning permission and Listed Building Consent was granted for the enclosure of the rear lightwell with a glass structure, the lowering of the basement floor level, the enclosure of the rear undercroft with frameless glazing, alterations to the rear windows and provision of new metal stair with gate to front railings.
•	P2019/1504 and P2019/1578 – Planning permission and Listed Building Consent was granted for the erection of a lower ground floor rear extension, partial excavation of the rear garden to create a lightwell and lightwell staircase with associated external and internal alterations. The alterations included a 260mm widening to the rear opening.
description: Widening of opening in rear lower-ground floor elevation of the property by 620mm
